# Arguments Viewer [(by Silverlink)](https://www.twitch.tv/silverlink)

## Description

This UI extension by Silverlink opens a UI window that outputs all `Argument` variables that were populated at the time the Sub-Action ran.

This is extremely useful for learning what variables you have available to use and to diagnose when things don't behave as you think they should.

## Installation

To install the extension, copy the following code and paste into your `Import Actions` pane:

```text

```

Once installed, you may need to open up the C# code to make sure it compiles correctly. Check the following reference files are listed:

```text
mscorlib.dll
System.dll
System.Windows.Forms.dll
System.Drawing.dll
```

## Usage

To use, open any `Action` and add a `C# Method` sub-action at the point wou wish to diagnose
Choose `Streamer.bot Argument Viewer`
Ensure the `Run on UI Thread` checkbox is ticked or the application is liable to crash

When the action executes a window similar to the one shown should pop up, listing all the arguments and their contents

![arguments-viewer.png](/depreciated/arguments-viewer/images/arguments-viewer.png)
